messages.subject: TV Wishes
messages.msgSnippet: At our house, it was the Swiffer.  He finally convinced his grandparents to get him one for Christmas.  Sure was a weird scene Christmas Eve opening presents
messages.messageBody:
At our house, it was the Swiffer. He finally convinced his grandparents to get him one for Christmas. Sure was a weird scene Christmas Eve opening presents -- his other male cousin of comparable age got dinosaurs that bit each other and "bled" fake blood, and Nik got a Swiffer. My brothers made all kinds of comments about how I needed to "watch out" and that "obviously, I needed to get him involved in sports, or he was going to grow up to be .... you know....." I didn't know whether to laugh or rage. Debi
>>The Downy Ball (fabric softener, thingy) was one he just loved "mom we
need to get this!"


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
